meanings.definition: A soft, muffled sound made by passing gas from the anus.
meanings.sent1: The little boy giggled at the poot he made during class.
meanings.sent2: I heard a poot coming from the other room.
meanings.sent3: The poot at the library was so unexpected, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her poot in the quiet room was like a tiny thunderclap.
meanings.sent5: The poot echoed in the empty hallway, making everyone turn around.

meanings.definition: To pass gas from the anus.
meanings.sent1: Please do not poot at the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: The dog decided to poot right in the middle of the living room.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but poot loudly during the serious meeting.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine sputtered and pooted as it struggled to start.
meanings.sent5: As he tried to hold back the urge to poot, he knew it was inevitable.
